<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurWord =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Short read.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">      BytesRead = BitcodeBytes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() - NextChar;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurWord = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> != BytesRead; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">        CurWord |= uint64&#95;t(NextCharPtr&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>&#93;) &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> &#42; 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    NextChar += BytesRead;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">    BitsInCurWord = BytesRead &#42; 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitsInWord = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">word&#95;t</a>) &#42; 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumBits &amp;&amp; NumBits &lt;= BitsInWord &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cannot return zero or more than BitsInWord bits!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Mask = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">word&#95;t</a>) &gt; 4 ? 63 : 0x1f;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the field is fully contained by CurWord, return it quickly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BitsInCurWord &gt;= NumBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">word&#95;t</a> R = CurWord &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">~word&#95;t</a>(0) &gt;&gt; (BitsInWord - NumBits));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use a mask to avoid undefined behavior.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurWord &gt;&gt;= (NumBits &amp; Mask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">      BitsInCurWord -= NumBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> R;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">word&#95;t</a> R = BitsInCurWord ? CurWord : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitsLeft = NumBits - BitsInCurWord;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> fillResult = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#ae3b93b659d4c4f5aeaaedc892916d1bf">fillCurWord</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::move(fillResult);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we run out of data, abort.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BitsLeft &gt; BitsInCurWord)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(std::errc::io&#95;error,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected end of file reading %u of %u bits&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">                               BitsInCurWord, BitsLeft);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">word&#95;t</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/mathextras-h/#a9211f62d8e1e6de999eaa63ec0f6ae02">R2</a> = CurWord &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">~word&#95;t</a>(0) &gt;&gt; (BitsInWord - BitsLeft));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use a mask to avoid undefined behavior.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurWord &gt;&gt;= (BitsLeft &amp; Mask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    BitsInCurWord -= BitsLeft;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">    R |= <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/mathextras-h/#a9211f62d8e1e6de999eaa63ec0f6ae02">R2</a> &lt;&lt; (NumBits - BitsLeft);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> R;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#ae4203a4bfd3d7e5cc1a1e43a76dc4188"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#ae4203a4bfd3d7e5cc1a1e43a76dc4188">ReadVBR</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MaybeRead)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t MaskBitOrder = (NumBits - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t Mask = 1UL &lt;&lt; MaskBitOrder;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t Result = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NextBit = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result |= (Piece &amp; (Mask - 1)) &lt;&lt; NextBit;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((Piece &amp; Mask) == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If word&#95;t is 64-bits and if we&#39;ve read less than 32 bits, just dump</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">word&#95;t</a>) &gt; 4 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#abf41858523e5da924205475408bac982"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#abf41858523e5da924205475408bac982">skipToEnd</a>() &#123; NextChar = BitcodeBytes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check whether a reservation of Size elements is plausible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#ab17fb6242cdd9d2b2f580c0b309bec3f"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#ab17fb6242cdd9d2b2f580c0b309bec3f">isSizePlausible</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t allow reserving more elements than the number of bits, assuming</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// at least one bit is needed to encode an element.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &lt; BitcodeBytes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() &#42; 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="comment">/// When advancing through a bitstream cursor, each advance can discover a few</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="comment">/// different kinds of entries:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry">BitstreamEntry</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1ceaff48a2349df5a9fe16c80d1d6e32e479"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1ceaff48a2349df5a9fe16c80d1d6e32e479">Error</a>,    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Malformed bitcode was found.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1cea69bcb0a249ff563515ad5c77bc19ebfe"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1cea69bcb0a249ff563515ad5c77bc19ebfe">EndBlock</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We&#39;ve reached the end of the current block, (or the end of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// file, which is treated like a series of EndBlock records.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1ceaac45aef6d995e5c810f2824a40fb1e2a"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1ceaac45aef6d995e5c810f2824a40fb1e2a">SubBlock</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the start of a new subblock of a specific ID.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
